attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LDUGoLqWvoZUltmHACR_description
attribs.current: Whenever you make an Intelligence (History) check related to the origin of stonework, you are considered proficient in the History skill and add double your proficiency bonus to the check, instead of your normal proficiency bonus.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LDUHWckalRMudSjNbYB_itemcontent

Includes:

• a backpack

• a bedroll

• a mess kit

• a tinderbox

• 10 torches

• 10 days of rations

• a waterskin

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LDUMHEM7UiXiUe1FjV4_description
attribs.current:
While raging, you gain the following benefits if you aren't wearing heavy armor:

You have advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.
When you make a melee weapon attack using Strength, you gain a +2 bonus to the damage roll. This bonus increases as you level.
You have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LDUNQ7kINewGv2XEyV3_description
attribs.current: As well respected as clan crafters are among outsiders, no one esteems them quite so highly as dwarves do. You always have free room and board in any place where dwarves or dwarves dwell, and the individuals in such a settlement might vie among themselves to determine who can offer you (and possibly your companions) the finest accommodations and assistance

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LDUh78i2OkHbSYE7UmT_description
attribs.current: You have advantage on Dexterity saving throws against effects that you can see, such as traps and spells. To gain this benefit, you can't be blinded, deafened, or incapacitated.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LDUhRowHOL9FZcAWJKT_description
attribs.current: When you make your first attack on your turn, you can decide to attack recklessly. Doing so gives you advantage on melee weapon attack rolls using Strength during this turn, but attack rolls against you have advantage until your next turn

attribs.name: allies_and_organizations
attribs.current:
DTH: 682 Hours
GSM: 112gp of Quality Materials
1000gp set aside in case he dies.

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: With the destruction of my clan, I've sworn myself to my hammer alone.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: Drink is my weakness, and I'll forever indulge when given the chance.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LECGQIMlj6YfNX5TeZV_atk_desc
attribs.current: If you forgo a short rest: while your allies rest, you are able to gather 3d8+10 worth of materials from the environment that can go towards crafting during DTH.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LECHe-sjokGz5-bmNQo_description
attribs.current: If you forgo a short rest while your allies rest, you are able to gather 3d10 worth of materials from the environment that can go towards crafting during DTH. At level 10 this amount increases to 4d10, and at level 15 this amount increases to 6d10.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEJ1kQAdEgF9gBMDrJu_description
attribs.current: You gain the might of a bear. Your carrying capacity (including maximum load and maximum lift) is doubled, and you have advantage on Strength checks made to push, pull, lift, or break objects

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEOPZiv9OF00d5mWUmV_description
attribs.current:
Your instincts are so honed that you have advantage on initiative rolls.

Additionally, if you are surprised at the beginning of combat and aren't incapacitated, you can act normally on your first turn, but only if you enter your rage before doing anything else on that turn.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LbVnStZIu6gx-k1810P_itemcontent
attribs.current: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LbVpadBGCWZ9cCUv778_itemcontent
attribs.current: A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.
